review.description: Great addition to Dumbo food options which until recently had been quite limited. They have a number of signature salads which all contain, to some degree, shredded kale. Found out I really like shredded​ kale. The place is bright and airy and very clean feeling. You can also, like most places create your own salad. The help are friendly and efficient. Pretty solid price to value. One criticism, the protein additions are off just a bit. Hence the 4
review.author: Kevin B.
